Reviews.Title: not bad for an older phone
Reviews.Author: underground_dj "Amazon via California"
Reviews.Content: expect slower performance since it's an older phone but it comes in a compact size which is a huge win!

Reviews.Title: the cell is locked
Reviews.Author: Ger
Reviews.Content: I bought this cel but when I insert my sim card I realize that the phone came from Spain and it was locked. Amazon should advise this on his web page. So I can`t use it. I am trying to obtain any help from the shipper, hope to get that help.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung Galaxy Mini S5570 will feature a QVGA (240 x 320) touchscreen with support for 262k colors,
General 2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
3G Network HSDPA 900 / 2100
Bluetooth 3.0, microSD card slot, 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, and will be running its usual TouchWiz UI on top of Android 2.2.1.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy MINI S5570
